LOGO.NAME: Expert Collective
LOGO.TAGLINE: a resource, a mindset, a catalyst

HOME.PITCH: The Expert Collective cooperative empowers you to be the change you want to see.
HOME.CALL-TO-ACTION: As Us How We Can Help You

ABOUT-US.CONTENT: We provide the relationships and knowledge to transform your passion and visionary ideas into value-centered ventures.
ABOUT-US.CONTENT-LABEL: We empower you through 3 distinct yet integrated strategies:
ABOUT-US.CODIFY-PACKAGE: Codify & package your knowledge for others to learn
ABOUT-US.GET-CAPITAL: Get capital to form new cooperatives & enterprises
ABOUT-US.EXPLANATION: The Expert Collective cooperative is a member-owned coop that seeks to bridge the gap between entrepreneurs and academic experts. We strive to allow access to top Experts in cutting edge fields to the business community that can fund and implement those breakthroughs.
